name: Golfin' Time
description:
Become one with your inner two-dimensional turnip and golf 18 holes. Go for a low score & a quick time!

Left-mouse click/drag in the 'aiming radius' to plan a shot then click shoot. The further from the ball you click, the more power in the shot. Press ESC for a pause menu.

Font used (Helve Cursive) can be found @ https://www.dafont.com/helve-cursive.font
